string.value: You hear Jane's got herself a new life ambition...

Last time, you got Jane some boar's teeth to convince her dad to let her travel. That didn't work. Now she has a new dream. She wants to be an alchemist! A bit fickle, but whatever. Now, she needs materials... You can guess where this is going. She wants you to get her #b1 Pure Water, 30 Medicines with Weird Vibe, and 20 Malady's Experimental Frogs#k so she can make some Elixir.
You got the materials Jane needed to make some elixir. If she fails...is the whole place going to blow up?
Hey! You helped me the other day! You know, even after I showed my dad the items you got me, he still wouldn't let me travel... Hmph. He said he knew I didn't get them myself.
I gave up on that dream shortly afterwards. Ah well. Anyway, I want to ask you for another favor... Do you have time?

I have a new dream. Being a traveler would be too tough for a pretty girl like me, hehe, so my new life ambition is to become a great alchemist! Someday I will be a better alchemist than even Maria in #m102000000#! Better believe it!
Alchemy isn't nearly as dangerous as traveling the world, so my dad's not against it. Oh! Do you even know what alchemy is? I better explain...
Alchemists can manipulate all sorts of matter to create special items.
You can guess where this is going, right? Hehe, I need materials to practice on! Can you please gather some for me?
Awesome! Let's see... I need #b1 #t2022000##k, #b30 Medicines with Weird Vibes#k, and #b20 #t4000041#s#k. If all goes well, I can make #t2000004#s!
Well, now. If you don't have time to listen to a poor girl's plea... Fine, just let me know if you change your mind.
Yippee! You got #b1 #t2022000##k, #b30 #t4000036##k, and #b20 #t4000041##k! Now, my turn. I just gotta mix these babies together and...
Voila! You know, this is my first time actually doing alchemy. Am I good or what? Here you go. Take it as a gift.
Wow. I've got a talent for this. I made 10 #r#t2000004#s#k during my very first experiment. You did your part to help, of course! Thank you.
You haven't collected #b1 #t2022000##k, #b30 #t4000036##k, and #b20 #t4000041#s#k, yet! I believe some vendors sell #t2022000#. You can get the other stuff from monsters.
